General.Name: BuilderSmart Public Company Limited
General.Description: BuilderSmart Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail sale of construction materials, tools, and equipment for the construction and interior design sectors in Thailand and internationally. It offers flooring solutions, as well as wall and ceiling systems; and sells doors, windows, and architectural systems and related installation services. The company is also involved in the development, sales, and leasing, as well as accommodation services for senior living projects; real estate development activities; and sale of the residential condominiums. In addition, it provides call center services; and training, and warehouse and logistic services. The company was formerly known as BuilderSmart Distribution Centre Ltd. and changed its name to BuilderSmart Public Company Limited in October 2007. BuilderSmart Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Mr. Suresh  Subramaniam
1.Title: Chairman of the Exec. Board & Director
